name: Pastime Baseball for Apple Watch
description:
Play Baseball on your Apple Watch!

Timing is key in this fast-paced, arcade-style baseball game. The better your timing, the better your hit.

How many runs can you score in a single inning? Get 3 outs and its Game Over.

Load the bases with singles and doubles, keep your eye on the ball and swing at the perfect moment to hit a Home Run!

Compete with your Game Center friends to score the most runs.

Tips:
- If the ball goes left you are swinging a bit early. If the ball goes right you are swinging a bit late.
- Try to swing a bit after the pitch has started
- Don't press too hard (force touches don't count!)

Note: This app pushes the Apple Watch to the limits of what is possible for a 3rd party app. Make sure no other watch apps are installing and you are on a low latency network for best results.

** Requires Apple Watch and iPhone 5 or later **
